    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    DomainExceptions
    Container for domain-specific runtime exceptions used in Lab 2.
    DomainExceptions.UserNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested user cannot be found.
    DomainExceptions.ValidationException
    Exception thrown when validation of domain data fails.
    Duck
    Duck user with type, speed and endurance.
    Duck.Tip
    Type of duck capabilities.
    Main
    Minimal console-based UI for DuckSocialNetwork (Lab 2).
    NetworkService
    Service layer for DuckSocialNetwork (Lab 2).
    Person
    Human user with additional personal fields.
    Repo
    Repository layer for DuckSocialNetwork (Lab 2).
    User
    Abstract representation of a user in the social network.
    Validators
    Simple validation utilities using Strategy-like lambdas.
